channel.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job
channel.description:
What conditioner do you use? I don't really care about guys conditioner versus girls's conditioner.
Women probably have the edge, because they have better conditioners lol. Know any good ones? (Talking to everyone here)
Oh and I'm using Suave Conditioner. It makes the hair kind of soft, but not as soft as it should be. I also tried Pert Plus which sucks cause it is Shampoo and Conditioner mixed. Those brands never work for me.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

jeez…

i hardly shampoo or wash my hair but if i do pantene

Read full topic
item.source: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job

item.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yeah we do. I have seen them in the local stores. Thanks everyone. I think I will stick with greeny’s idea, and pretty much everyone else’s since a lot of people seem to like Pantene and Garnier.

Read full topic
item.source: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job

item.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Well im a swimmer and do 18 hours a week training, makes my hair go like straw so I have to condition twice daily.

Best ones that worked for me are those Pantene ProV ones and Garnier (sp?)
but they are English so Dont know if you have them or not over there.

Read full topic
item.source: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job

item.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

No I’m not an emo, goth, chav, or poser. Actually i don’t even know what a chav or poser is, not that I give a flying fuck lol.

I am my own. I’m Ron. Not a sheep.

And I just want my silky smooth hair back. I used to always have it, but ever since 2 months ago my shampoo isn’t working. I dont know, maybe my Shampoo is spoilt. That could be a problem lol. And Aftermath, yes yes I do.

I know some ‘emo’ people without smooth hair or sily smooth hair.

Read full topic

item.title: My conditioner doesn't seem to being doing the job

item.description:

Hey thanks for all the posts. I guess I’ll try pantene since 2 people suggested it, and I’ll look into garnier and herbal essence.

Any others that are good? I want to make sure before buying another crappy one and getting split ends and whatever else. :rolleyes:
